tool_description: Aadhaar full kyc like name ,photo, address..etc
name: Aadhaar verification OKYC
title: Aadhaar verification OKYC

api_list.name: aadhaarverify
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aadhaar-verification-okyc.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/VerifyCaptcha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aadhaar-verification-okyc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
